title: Jamie Dimon defends JPMorgan's tech spending to avoid getting 'left behind'
full_text:
Jamie Dimon defends JPMorgan's tech spending to avoid getting 'left behind'. Dimon said the bank's expected $9 billion spending increase would help it stay competitive not only with other big banks, but also fintech companies.. JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon.Noam Galai/Getty Images
  • Jamie Dimon defended JPMorgan's spending, especially on tech, during Tuesday's earnings call.
  • He said the bank would stay ahead… [+3129 chars]
